statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.Code , AA.Url , AA.Category , AA.Style , AA.UseYn , AA.Description
, M1.Name as CategoryName , M2.Name as StyleName
FROM dbo.TBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Category = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'BrandCategory' LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M2 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.Style = M2.Code AND M2.ParentCode = 'BrandStyle' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.BrandName LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
AND AA.UseYn = #UseYn#
AND AA.Category = #Category#
AND AA.Style = #Style#
ORDER BY RowNo

SELECT AA.* , CC.Url as ImageUrl
FROM dbo.TBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.TBrandImage BB WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ID = BB.BrandID AND BB.ImageType = '11' LEFT JOIN dbo.TImage CC with (nolock) ON BB.ImageID = CC.ID WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TBrand AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.Name = #Name#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TBrand ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, Code, Url, Category, Style, UseYn, Description, DescriptionRTF ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #Code#, #Url#, #Category#, #Style#, #UseYn#, #Description#, #DescriptionRTF# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TBrand SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , Code = #Code# , Url = #Url# , Category = #Category# , Style = #Style# , Description = #Description# , DescriptionRTF = #DescriptionRTF# , UseYn = #UseYn# WHERE ID = #ID#
